text: Dwight Craig Horn (born May 9, 1944) is a Republican member of the North Carolina General Assembly.http://votesmart.org/candidate/biography/117836/craig- horn#.VWvY82TBzGc He represents the 68th district. ==References== Category:Living people Category:North Carolina Republicans Category:21st- century American politicians Category:1944 births
title: D. Craig Horn
